website_summaries.verdict: This powerful exfoliating lotion is the first choice for many sufferers of eczema, keratosis pilaris, and other skin conditions.
pros: This lotion exfoliates skin while also moisturizing and helping to restore your skin's protective barrier
It's free of fragrance and dyes, so it's safe to use on sensitive skin
It does not burn or itch when applied
cons: The lotion doesn't soak into skin very well, and some have said it left them feeling sticky

customer_reviews.author: Tracy

I will probably be using this everyday for the rest of my life, thank you so much.

customer_reviews.author: Dumb Dora

customer_reviews.title: Best sensitive, clogged skin moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My only dislike is there isn’t a larger size option. I’ve always been embarrassed by my skin texture. Living in a dry and dry only climate I always thought I had oily skin. Turns out I was so dry my sebaceous glands were over producing oil and clogging my follicles n’ pores; causing what I self diagnosed “Kratosis Pilaris”. I thought I would need to drain 4 bottles before I saw results, but after only one complete body use my KP was managed. Consistency is key. After every shower, while wet, entire body emersion. Spot treat everywhere I need it throughout the days between. Literally one use. I’m addicted. I also purchased the cleanser for ultimate experience.

customer_reviews.text: This product helped me with a skin condition caused by the different medications that I have to take and the humidity. I am allergic to humidity and my skin gets extremely dry and I develop rough-dry white patches that are hard to eliminate with body lotion. I tried it as a suggestion from my doctor and it is a life saver. All the skin problems started to go away and I still keep using it because I want to prevent a recurrence due to humidity.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: MADE MY SKIN MORE BUMPY!
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't do what it said it would at all! Most of my pores have been clogged and my skin looks terribly oily. The ingredients are absolutely disgusting and will, quite literally, give you cancer. I have gotten a massive cyst on my forehead that hurts badly, and I have a lot of other inflammed clogged pores. Are you kidding me? I don't know if this is fake or a knock-off or what, but this 'moisturizer' sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Cooklin

customer_reviews.title: Smooths out rough skin!
customer_reviews.text: If you have ingrowns, this is for you. I often get little bumps on my thighs and legs and my go-to lotion, Curel Rough Skin Rescue, was discontinued. I bought this to see if it would help with the bumps and it did! It also just helped my skin smooth out overall. It softened my ankles and elbows too. I just wish it was a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Simone K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and have purchased very expensive lotions for my face in the past. A friend of mine told me that her dermatologist recommended CeraVe, so I figured I'd give it a try. It is now my favorite face lotion. Not only does it not irritate my skin, it actually seems to calm it a bit. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: When it showed up, it wasn’t completely full. Almost like I got what someone returned! Also, I have eczema and when I would put it on my hands at night, I would wake up to them feeling sore. I can’t explain why, but it did not feel good and I went back to trying out other products!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far....
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Lotion two weeks ago, then the Body Wash a week ago, and I'm already seeing an improvement. My kelatosis pilar on my back and shoulders always bothered me, and I was hesitant to purchase just anything to try and treat it. With so many products on Amazon with reviews that could go either way, I'm glad I decided on this product. It seems to be helping, and as having pretty sensitive skin, it hasn't caused me to break out or start itching.
customer_reviews.author: Monique C.

customer_reviews.title: Works!?
customer_reviews.text: Idk if it’s a placebo effect but after a handful of uses I already see the difference. I’ve always suffered from extreme itching and bumps after shaving my legs after using this I don’t notice it as much.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Keep skin soft and moisture
customer_reviews.text: I used it up after couple months on and off. It keeps my skin soft and moisture after bath and apply. The smell is ok, not noticeable. But that is all. The redness and bumpy skin is just still there. Update: my sister said she used it as hand cream and it worked amazing to her dry hands. So maybe it just not work for me
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine P

customer_reviews.title: Works great and fast
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lotion for two weeks and it had already smoothed out my legs. I've tried several other products but CeraVe SA works. I can only barely feel the bumps on sections of my legs. I'm using a scar gel in addition to help even my tone. Hopefully I can still the spots.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Great for Acne/KP
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for my expensive 15% glycolic acid body moisturizer I was using in the past. This really works on my body acne/scars/Keratosis Pilaris without stressing my sensitive skin out, and it has a minimal scent. It absorbs fairly well into the skin and doesn't leave any noticeable sheen like I got with my previous lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Sbullet

customer_reviews.title: Good for KP
customer_reviews.text: I was using Gold Bond rough and bumpy and it worked well but putting my fingers in the container every night was getting old. Sometimes if I used to much it left a weird film. I found this one and I love the pump (wheeeew!) plus I haven’t had any weird film residue. I use it for dry skin on my knees and KP on the back of my arms. I’ve only been using it for 2 weeks or so but it’s alrrady better than the Gold Bond.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I am ordering this product. This was recommended by my dermatologist for my elbows where I have really dry skin and some little bumps. My skin is very fair and sensitive and this product works great with my skin. It doesn’t feel like it’s exfoliating but you definitely see a difference after continued use. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T.Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Exploded in Package
customer_reviews.text: This product came already opened. The envelope is really soft. I’m gonna have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: jos t

customer_reviews.title: Nice & light
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of Lubriderm... just has extra ingredients on the label. Nice, light scent. I'll do a later review if I notice some skin improvement, however I'll be using this lotion in combination with a product that has glycolic acid as well.
customer_reviews.author: shandianxia

customer_reviews.title: Helps so much!!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for something to help my keratosis pilaris on my legs. After some research I came across this lotion and I’m glad that I did! It’s been about a week already and it has helped my itchy legs so much. The bumps are going away also. I’ve been using in the morning and at night. I’ll definitely be sticking with this lotion!
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for KP!
customer_reviews.text: I've got KP ("chicken skin") pretty bad on my arms and legs. I've just bought this lotion and used it ONCE, yesterday, and already see a difference. It's not as dramatic on my legs but my arms for sure are smoother and feel hydrated. No fragrance, no burning or anything from the acid. Will definitely keep buying this!
customer_reviews.author: HNNNNNNNNNNNNGGGGG

customer_reviews.title: HUGE help for Keratosis pilaris!
customer_reviews.text: Likes -Hasn't irritated my skin as far as causing it to look red in appearance and I've been using it pretty much everywhere with no issues. -It makes my skin looka bit more glowing rather than oily, was genuinely surprised by how good my face looks as far as softness in appearance -Has worked wonders for extremely upset/raised chicken skin. It's the only thing that has EVER made a noticeable difference on my upper arms and shoulders. It's a slow process, and I try to really scrub my skin before applying for (what I would hope to be) the best possible results
customer_reviews.author: Alyssapj98

customer_reviews.title: Banishes Keratosis Pilaris
customer_reviews.text: The only lotion that makes my KP disappear. I have extremely dry skin and get keratosis pilaris so I use SA soap and this lotion, resulting in the smoothest skin ever! The only downside is that this bottle is quite small and only lasts about a month. I’m probably going to start using retinol lotion every other day too to stretch it out. It’s the only true SA lotion out there so I don’t have much of a choice but it really is a good product. I’m thankful for my smooth skin
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great Non-Greasy Moisturizer For Smoother Skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion because it feels less greasy than other lotions I’ve tried. I’ve refused to put on lotion after the shower because I hate having to yank on clothes while you’re feeling all sticky and gross but this product absorbs pretty fast so it eliminates that issue for me. My skin also had bumps on the upper arms but they seem to be getting much smoother after using this daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelia

customer_reviews.title: Maybe
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I felt a slight tingle on my bumpy arms and I thought that was good and maybe it was helping to release the keratin build up in my hair follicles (the actual cause of these bumps). I still don’t know if that’s a good tingle or not. I never followed up daily but I’ll try again. The scent was minimal to nothing. It wasn’t overly oily. Dried fast and absorbed very well. Follow through is key.
customer_reviews.author: Jenocidal

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: I’m still deciding if I like this. I have KP (bumpy skin) and it’s working in some areas but not everywhere. Also leaves skin a little sticky. Not going to feel great in summer
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff because it helps with bumps and makes my skin so soft. However, I don't notice any difference in my skin between using this one and the cheaper tub by Gold Bond. So if I want more product for less money with the same skin benefits then there are other products I can get.
customer_reviews.author: sav

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I LOVE the facial moisturizer. This does exactly what it says, smooths the rough skin I tend to get on the fronts of my thighs, will absolutely buy again. Also, I have very sensitive skin, allergic to half the world, it seems, no adverse reaction to CeraVe products whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: T. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this cleanser after doing a lot of research on cleansers. I was always breaking out. I thought it was my diet. I changed my diet, but my breakouts didn’t change. So I switched from Dove soap to this an within a week I didn’t have any breakouts! This is my savior! I’m stocking up
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Like a lovely face nightcream for your body!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This stuff is amazing! I don’t have skin issues, I purchased it because of the brand and the ingredients. It feels amazing on your skin! And no greasiness, it really is just lovely! I feel like this is great for anyone, everyone should have a lotion that has this dynamic. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: stasiadub

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PUT THIS ON YOUR FACE
customer_reviews.text: I have seen many youtubers say that this helped there textured skin so if you are here because of that BE CAUTIOUS!!! This lotion is very thick and it made me break out! It clogged my pores and I am still trying to figure out how to clear my skin since it hasn't since using this product. If anyone has had a smilair experience please tell me how you got your skin back to normal??? Again this won't happen to everyone but it did to me so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Cleared KP on Back of Arms
customer_reviews.text: CeraVe is my go to for anything skin moisture related. I had really bad KP on the back of my arms and this helped clear it within a week. I put it on every night after my shower and saw dramatic improvement. After that I probably put it on 3-4 times a week now, not daily only because I really try to put it on to completely clean skin. If you moisturize every single day and have some rough skin I HIGHLY recommend it. No real smell. It is a little thick so let arms or body part dry before putting on clothes. I will always have a bottle of this.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t improve anything
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with ingrown hairs primarily and have been using it religiously. It’s done nothing so far unfortunately. It hasn’t really helped with any other issues either but the moisturizer itself is nice and seems to hydrate well. Disappointed, wish I was having the results everyone else is.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I’ve been using it on my face for a couple of days and I can already notice a difference in my skin texture. It’s a great moisturizer to use during the day under makeup, or at night before bed! Love how it contains salicylic acid, great ingredient for acne prone skin (which is what I have). Pretty much all Cerave products have great ingredients at a fair price. Very affordable, quality skincare :)
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works but the bottle needs to be 10 times the size
customer_reviews.text: I loved how smooth this made my skin. It definitely softened the bumps on my arms and started to clear them up. However, I felt like I had to put a very thick layer on and then I ran out of the product so quickly. Because of the cost and because I already spend a lot on other cerave products, I decided not to repurchase. If u don't mind the cost and having a heavy film on your skin then this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Ericha H.

customer_reviews.title: This Product is amazing for many skin problems
customer_reviews.text: It moisturizes the skin in a way that I have not previously experienced. It actually work to clear up a break out on my face more effectively than a doctor prescribed cream. I was amazed at the difference in my skin after using it just a few days. The delivery was almost immediate - many thanks
customer_reviews.author: LLBrit

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this lotion to help get rid of my keratosis pilaris. The smell is not the greatest but it is super moisturizing. Unfortunately I was not able to see if it worked well for keratosis pilaris or not because I broke out in a rash after a few applications. I must be allergic to something in the lotion but it's hard to say what it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Springer

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my absolute favorite moisturizers. The consistency is like a lotion, not too thick. It has a slight smell, but nothing overpowering. I absolutely love what it does for skin- hydrate it while smoothing my face. I have seen results for such a long time. Highly recommend especially if you are acne prone or normal to oily!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive body moisturizer for many different skin conditions!
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is incredible stuff and seriously impressed me. I have combination, acne-prone, and sensitive skin. I've already used up my first bottle in less than a month and have noticed overall better skin texture and hydration and improvements in several of the skin problems I struggle with. Namely, my keratosis pilaris ("chicken skin") on my arms and body acne have significantly improved, which is pretty incredible considering the short time period! I've already purchased a second, larger size of this lotion and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Bee

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for bumpy arms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to relieve the keratin bumps on the back of my daughter's arms. It took about 3-4 weeks but, in combination with exfoliating 3x a week, it's greatly decreased the bumps. One arm is virtually clear and the other is 90% better than it used to be. The lotion is very light and takes a few minutes to dry but there is no smell and it didn't irritate my daughter's sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Luecke

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and effective!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had backne that was getting bothersome to him before we bought this lotion. It was great for his skin-it moisturized while dealing with the acne quickly and effectively. He feels better not dealing with the pain from the acne, and he enjoys back rubs significantly more too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: I don't think this is the real stuff
customer_reviews.text: I received this and starting using it immediately. I already had the rough and bumpy facewash which is great ( I went into the store and purchased it), so I figured I'd use the lotion as well. I'm not sure if this is the actual product. The label looks a little sketchy first of. It looks kind of fake. As I was using it, I noticed it was making my skin very oily and I actually have dry skin. I also got a little rash on my face. I am returning it today and I will go back to using Cetaphil as a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Collins

customer_reviews.title: Works great for rough, bumpy and acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Until now the only lotion that works for me! I have keratosis pilaris/acne on legs, bum and arms. Other lotions would make me break out even more or would make my skin feel sticky (especially ureum based lotions). This lotion has made my skin feel real smooth, has cleared up my bum. My legs are feeling soft and are slowly clearing up (not as fast as bum has). The lotion is not sticky and has no scent. I even use this lotion on my face and it works well for me. The price is acceptable so I am very very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it- didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Kinda soft feeling but nothing crazy- got it to help with post pregnancy bumpy skin in arms. Didn’t work. I actually think it got worse. There is no smell which is good I guess.. feels just ok. I’ll stick with using coconut oil. Way better
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Took away my strawberry legs and random little red bumps on my arms and legs!
customer_reviews.author: Breanne F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for KP - No sticky feel or urine smell
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every lotion out there for keratosis pilaris (KP/chicken skin). Am-Lactin, Lac-Hydrin, Gold Bond Rough & Bumpy, etc. This is the ONLY lotion that worked without leaving a thick sticky feeling on my skin or smelling like urine. This lotion soaks into the skin quickly, leaving no residue. No lingering pee scent, either. It exfoliates well, but doesn't cause big pills of skin or excess lotion to ball up like the Gold Bond. It's pricey in stores, and I use this lotion every other day on my arms and legs. Holy grail for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

product_meta.title: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
product_meta.description:
Size:8 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)

Developed with dermatologists, skin smoothing CeraVe Renewing SA Lotion has a unique lightweight formula that exfoliates and moisturizes while helping to restore the protective skin barrier. Salicylic acid exfoliates and softens to smooth rough skin, lactic acid exfoliates to renew skin’s surface and three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) help to restore the protective skin barrier.

 * Non-comedogenic
 * Fragrance-free
 * Hypoallergenic
 * Gentle, non-irritating formula



Key Ingredients:

 * Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates for soft, smooth skin
 * Vitamin D: Provides antioxidant protection
 * MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration
 * Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
 * Hyaluronic acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
 * Niacinamide: Helps repair a compromised skin barrier while improving the appearance of the skin.
feature_bullets: [ EXFOLIATES ] Exfoliates and moisturizes with Lactic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin D to leave skin softened and smoothed
[ ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Formulated with with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) that help restore and maintain its natural protective barrier
[ PATENTED TECHNOLOGY ] Utilizes patented MVE controlled-release technology to help replenish ceramides and deliver long lasting moisturization
[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Free of fragrance and dye, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and non-irritating
[ RICH TEXTURE ] Ideal for extremely dry, rough, bumpy and Psoriasis-prone skin
